body:
Heyo, my name is Ludchi or Theo. I used to play here, and OCN before but i lost interest in minecraft and stopped playing. 

And nowadays since i don't really got so many friends anymore i've started to miss minecraft and their PvP communities. So i decided to try and get back playing. So this will be a some sort of a ''comeback AMA''.

L
